entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
